title: Wear Compass
summary: Enjoy millions of the latest Android apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines & more. Anytime, anywhere, across your devices.
description: Features :- Android wear standalone included !- Shows your direction(degrees) on center- Shows direction of north, south, east and west- The accuracy of result depends on device's sensor accuracy.
descriptionHTML:
Features :

- Android wear standalone included !

- Shows your direction(degrees) on center
- Shows direction of north, south, east and west
- The accuracy of result depends on device's sensor accuracy.
comments: Off center & arrow points left instead of ahead Looks terrible on moto 360, off center and pointer points left instead of ahead. Will ask for refund. Fix and will gladly rebuy. Also option for black face with white design to save battery would be nice.
Not for Moto360 Off center and doesn't show true north.
Looks and works great LG G Watch
